verbs.description: splendors of india and asia theme at dia [V: gala] the annual detroit institute of arts gala was as elegant as ever on saturday but this year event planners decided to kick it up a notch with vibrantly colored decor detroit institute of arts anish kapoor salvador salort - pons anita rajpal india director raj vattikuti chuck bennett forte belanger dia gala anne g fredericks robert cynthia ford dia asia ford motor company fund president and ceo padma kresge court katherine jacobs asian wing
